 Flood fill a region.

Detailed Description

BitmapExt is an extended version of the Bitmap class, including methods not in Gdiplus::Bitmap.

Status AggOO::BitmapExt::Mask ( Bitmap *  src,
Bitmap *  mask,
BOOL  invertMask = 0 
)

Mask a source bitmap with a mask bitmap and store the result here

Parameters:
src Pointer to the source image
mask Pointer to the mask image
invertMask If true, then wherever the mask has alpha > 0, the source pixel is kept. If false, keep the source pixel where alpha == 0.

Status AggOO::BitmapExt::Mask ( Bitmap *  src,
Bitmap *  mask,
unsigned int  x,
unsigned int  y,
unsigned int  width,
unsigned int  height,
BOOL  invertMask = 0 
)

Mask a source bitmap with a mask bitmap and store the result here

Parameters:
src Pointer to the source image
mask Pointer to the mask image
x X-coordinate of the region to mask
y Y-coordinate of the region to mask
width Width of the mask region
height Height of the mask region
invertMask If true, then wherever the mask has alpha > 0, the source pixel is kept. If false, keep the source pixel where alpha == 0.

Status AggOO::BitmapExt::FloodFill ( INT  x,
INT  y,
const Color &  newColor 
)

Flood fill a region.

Replaces all adjacent pixels, starting at the specified point, with the new color.

Parameters:
x X coordinate of the location to start filling
y Y coordinate of the location to start filling
newColor Color to fill the region with
